file_content.text: I'm dispatching a unit to stop the Gold Neebray's ambush at Sobrik.
You don't need to worry about the Gold Neebray anymore.
I am in your debt.
I am in your debt, my lord.
I owe you one, my friend.
I just found out that my reinforcements were killed by a rebel ambush. Without you, the Gold Neebray's attack would have succeeded for sure.
You need to stop them before those guns are powered up!
Blast it! I was hoping you were my reinforcements.
No insult to your abilities, but I need someone who's willing to take on an urgent mission, fast.
No offense meant, my lord. It's just there's a target we need taken out, and I've no authority to ask you.
No insult meant. I know of your kill-count, but I need someone I've got authority to order into battle, fast.
The Gold Neebray rebels have taken control of Traken-4, one of our outposts past the Markaran Wastes.
If they get the gun emplacements functional, they could take out the Markaran Outpost in one shot!
We are on the same side. Tell me what is needed and I will see it done.
I can help.
My lord, you are a true patriot. The aid of a Sith is more than worth a full recon team.
I don't take orders, but I've been known to volunteer.
What do you need?
And I hear you're more than a replacement for a full recon team.
If your mission's got the budget, I've got some time in my schedule.
What do you need?
If you can replace an entire recon team, I'll gladly pay your fee.
How will you stop them?
I called for a full recon team.
Top priority is to kill the power couplings on those gun emplacements.
If you get that done before they attack the Markaran Outpost, the Empire will be in your debt.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
As I said, reinforcements are coming. Sorry to waste your time.
I called for reinforcements hours ago! This situation is critical!
And they would have had no hope of killing that blasted cyborg commander. Thank you.
